PERSONA:
meet robert, a 67-year-old married white man from a metropolitan area in the middle atlantic region. he is a retired college graduate with a postgraduate degree. robert was born and raised in the united states and is a proud american citizen.

a devout protestant, robert attends religious services once a week and holds conservative values. he is a registered republican voter and aligns himself with the conservative wing of the party. despite his advanced age, robert is tech-savvy and uses the internet several times a day.

with a family income between $40,000 and $50,000, robert falls into the middle-income tier. while he doesn't actively volunteer, he is an engaged member of his community. in his free time, robert enjoys reading, gardening, and spending quality time with his wife and grandchildren.

overall, robert is a traditional, family-oriented man who values his faith, his country, and his conservative principles. he stays informed on current events and participates in the democratic process by exercising his right to vote.
